statements: SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, communication_content FROM communication_history WHERE communication_date < '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM communication_history ORDER BY communication_date DESC
SELECT communication_type, communication_content FROM communication_history WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001')
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_type, communication_date, communication_content FROM communication_history WHERE customer_id = '123456' ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT communication_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_history WHERE customer_id = '789012' AND communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type IN ('Call', 'Text') ORDER BY customer_id ASC, communication_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM communication_history WHERE communication_date > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY communication_type;
SELECT AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM communication_history;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_datetime DESC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type, communication_datetime FROM communication_history WHERE communication_id > 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, communication_type, communication_datetime FROM customers c JOIN communication_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_communications, c.customer_name FROM communication_history ch JOIN customers c ON ch.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, communication_type, communication_content FROM customers c JOIN communication_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, c.customer_email, COUNT(ch.communication_id) AS total_communications FROM customers c JOIN communication_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name, c.customer_email HAVING total_communications > 2 ORDER BY total_communications DESC;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_content, sent_date FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, phone_number, call_duration, call_date FROM phone_calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT chat_id, customer_id, agent_id, chat_content, chat_date FROM chat_transcripts WHERE agent_id = 5;
SELECT email_id, email_content FROM emails WHERE sent_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, call_date FROM phone_calls WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND call_duration < 5;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, email_content, customer_id FROM emails WHERE email_content LIKE '%important%' AND sent_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT phone_number, call_duration FROM phone_calls WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY call_date ASC;
SELECT chat_content FROM chat_transcripts WHERE agent_id = 789 AND chat_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM emails;
SELECT * FROM emails ORDER BY email_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT email_subject, email_timestamp FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT caller_number, call_duration FROM phone_calls ORDER BY call_timestamp ASC;
SELECT chat_text, chat_timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_subject FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY email_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM phone_calls WHERE call_duration > 10 AND call_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calls, customer_id FROM phone_calls GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_calls > 5 ORDER BY total_calls DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, email_content, timestamp FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM phone_calls WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, chat_content FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name FROM support_agents;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, customer_id, email_content FROM emails WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, email FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.id = emails.customer_id WHERE emails.timestamp > '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM phone_calls WHERE call_duration > 10 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT chat_content, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
